metadata.story_name:
As a team of heroes coming together, you must fight against corruption, gang violence and the dangerous people who are like you....but prefer to use their powers for evil.

Balance your life and your other life, be a hero, but never forget that you have your own responsibilities to deal with.

writing_prompt: In a city that never sleeps, where neon lights mask the shadows of its darkest corners, five strangers—each with their own secrets, struggles, and abilities—are unknowingly drawn together by a scream that echoes through the night. What connects them, and what will they uncover in the heart of the city?

metadata.story_name:
Only a few people in the universe know what true beauty is in the stars.

Welcome to the universe. Far from Earth, alien races and species live like ours......though with much greater technologies, strange biologies and more.

You are one of these people. Human, alien or something in between. Archeologist, assassin, bounty hunter, space royalty.....you are trying to make your way in the universe....whether you're an exile, rebel or outlaw, you're here to stay.

However, in this universe, whispers of an oncoming war are beginning to rise. Will that stop you from following a chance of getting rich quick?

writing_prompt: On the bustling space station of Serefspace, a starving alien parasite, a gambling pilot, a pampered aristocrat, a curious robot, and a lonely music enthusiast each find themselves drawn into an unexpected web of intrigue, danger, and unlikely alliances. What could possibly unite such a mismatched group in the chaos of the Omega galaxy?

metadata.story_name:
In 1935, Carl Denham lead an expedition to a lost world. The location was called "Skull Island". On the island were ancient creatures, beasts from times long past that had evolved in the harsh and wild environment of the island when all other species had died. Dinosaurs, enormous species of insect and other, older beasts.

Through the expedition, Denham captured and brought back a gigantic species of gorilla known as Kong for the world to marvel at. In New York, Kong escaped from captivity and, deemed a danger, was shot by airplanes. Kong was considered the last of his kind.

Eight years have passed since then. The second World War has begun and the people are unsure as to what will happen.

Since Denhams expedition, only a few expeditions have been launched to the Island. However, many are too afraid to step foot on the edifice, frightened of the creatures and beasts that roam the isle.Intelligent people wouldn't toy around with long extinct species and ancient dinosaurs.

Too bad you took this job.

*This game is more based on the Peter Jackson film than the Monsterverse, just so you know that off the bat. :) )*

writing_prompt: Decades after Skull Island was abandoned and left to legend, a new expedition sets out to rediscover its secrets—but as the island looms on the horizon, the crew begins to wonder if some mysteries are better left buried.

metadata.story_name:
It begins as a normal day, nothing out of the ordinary as you live your day. Then the sirens begin. The screams in the distance and the rising moans of the horde. 

A band of survivors join together to attempt to outlast  the undead. But will they survive or will they be destroyed from within?

writing_prompt: The world ended quietly at first, with no warnings or explanations, just strange disappearances and the hum of helicopters overhead. Now, as chaos unfolds, three strangers—an abandoned bride, a reckless college student, and a pregnant woman waiting for her husband—must navigate the rising horror of the dead walking among the living.

metadata.story_name: There are a billion Houses in the Imperium. Now is the time for yours to rise. Create a Great House and find your place within it and mark your territory, on Arrakis or beyond.

writing_prompt: In a galaxy ruled by the volatile Emperor Voris III, whispers of rebellion grow louder. On the storm-drenched planet of Chimera, a Bene Gesserit sister and a Mentat uncover a deadly conspiracy that could shift the balance of power in the Imperium—if they can survive long enough to expose it.
